Map
===

Control Panel
-------------

  

### Control Panel Items

The control panel on the upper right of the map allows the user to pan, zoom and rotate the map.

The table below provides a description of each button on the map control panel.

  
  

![rotate the map clockwise](images/PamPanZoomRotateClockwise.png)

rotate map clockwise

![zoom in](images/PamPanZoomZoomIn.png)

zoom in

![orientate the map to the ship's heading](images/PamPanZoomHeadUp.png)

orientate map to ship's heading

![rotate the map anti-clockwise](images/PamPanZoomRotateAnticlockwise.png)

Pan up-Left

![zoom out](images/PamPanZoomZoomOut.png)

zoom out

![orientate the map to North](images/PamPanZoomNorthUp.png)

orientate map North

![rotate the map anti-clockwise](images/PanWithMouse.png)

Pan with mouse

![zoom out](images/MeasureWithMouse.png)

Measure with mouse

![set map centre on ship](images/PamPanZoomCentreOnShip.png)

set map centre on ship

  

The controls can be displayed or hidden using the map pop-up menu.
